name: S.T.A.C.K.E.R. Clear Bag
description:
Inspired by Neil Thapen's amazing S.T.A.L.K.E.R. demake S.T.A.C.K.E.R.

CONTROLS:

To start your journey to Chernobyl, click the Continue Traveling button. This button is used to continue traveling after every event. Use the checkmark and X buttons to make decisions during an event.

Click and drag items to move them around. Double click on a useable item to use it.

CREDITS:

Check out the GitHub repo for the full credits.

Main menu music: Bandit Radio from S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Clear Sky with JdebMkay's piano arrangement.
In-game music: kickhat - Ambient Drone 21.07.2018
Inventory tetris system: Inventory system originally created by [Farrokh Games](http://www.farrokhgames.com/) under the [MIT License](https://github.com/FarrokhGames/Inventory/blob/master/LICENSE).
Logo font: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. logo lookalike font by Amazingmax
Everything else font: Pixel Operator by Jayvee Enaguas
